body.p: You are terrible database. I can understand your purpose, but you make my time here simply unbearable.

You and your posse of "X" related products disgust me. I find your lack of human readability appalling and distastful. Your query language confuses me, and while I do attest to being far more farmiliar to both SQL and noSQL in the forms of MongoDB, your brand of querying just dumbfounds me.
After this letter, you will never again hear from me. I will not touch you, look upon you, nor even acknowledge your existence.
